verses.name: Revelation 13:3
verses.text: And I saw one of his heads as it were wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.

verses.name: Revelation 13:4
verses.text: And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?

verses.name: Revelation 13:5
verses.text: And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him to continue forty and two months.
